reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be well-made and flattering, particularly noting how it hides the belly area.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this one!
items.body: I really love this sweater. It’s warm and cute, the tie makes it even cuter. I love the fit and it’s very soft. I’m really happy with this purchase. I would say it’s medium thickness and stretch. I think it’s well worth the price point. High quality without breaking the bank. Read more
items.author: Truth be told

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Xl fit me well, paired with pencil skirt
items.body: Love this sweater, I am 220lbs, 5'2" and got the XL. while the sleeves were a little long, the length of the sweater was perfect! Wore it to a work conference and looked amazing, professional and was comfortable all day. It is light enough for inside a conference space but warm enough for a brisk fall day. Dressed with a pencil skirt this was perfect, but a pair of jeans and this could be a great casual Friday Read more
items.author: Lisa Bishop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Great sweater! Quality thickness and color is very vibrant. Material is soft, not itchy at all. Simple but stylish and can be casual with jeans and boots or dressed up with heels. Read more
items.author: KittyKat

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater with slenderizing tie front...
items.body: Although I returned this sweater because it was not flattering on me, it is a very cute and soft sweater. The grey is a true neutral gray, not too blue or to brownish like some are. The front tie is a cute and slenderizing touch. It does make the center a bit of a crop style (which does not work for me). I suppose this could be offset by purchasing a larger size. The sleeve lengths would work for pretty much anyone, as the cuffs are long enough to roll up and inch or three if too long, while still looking like it was meant to be rolled. Overall it's a nice sweater for the price. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I feel like it may pill after a few washes. Read more
items.author: Mirthbound

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Uncomfortable material
items.body: Very cute style but the material is itchy and full of static. Returning it. Read more
items.author: SAS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. It is so soft and comfortable. It fits true to size. I would definitely buy this again. Read more
items.author: Sophie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for short torsos
items.body: Fits as expected, especially if you have a shorter torso. The deep red color is nice and the fabric is generally soft. I would purchase another color. Read more
items.author: Forshtays

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVING THIS SWEATER!!!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater! I am pretty particular about my clothes- but this one checks off all the boxes: it's very flattering, made well, washes well, and the material feels soft. I actually am ended up buying another color and todayI'll be buying more! It goes well with jeans, leggings, or even yoga pants for a causal everyday look. Just get it! Read more
items.author: Animal Lover

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Dark Army Green, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
